snippet: Exquisite images from the Rimpa school of Japanese painting inspired a multimedia program by the Bang on a Can All-Stars.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews Somei Satoh's composition Shu and other Japanese-inspired musical pieces, performed by Bang on a Can All-Stars, at Japan Society.
lead_paragraph: Exquisite images from the Rimpa school of Japanese painting inspired a multimedia program by the Bang on a Can All-Stars.

headline.seo: Bang on a Can All-Stars’ ‘Rimpa Reimagined’
headline.main: Swans, Dragons and Other Bold Images Cast Spells on the Melodies
headline.print_headline: Swans, Dragons and Other Bold Images Cast Spells on the Melodies
